website_summaries.verdict: Sturdy and full-featured, it's the businessperson's secret weapon.
pros: Features 1.8GHz Intel Quad Core i7-855OU processor, 16GB of DDR4 RAM, and a 500GB SSD with multiple upgrade options
Built for the road with a spill-resistant keyboard, optical drive, and 13 hours of battery life
Fingerprint readers keeps your data safe and secure
Comes with Windows 10 Professional 64 operating system
cons: Cooling fan can be quite noisy

customer_reviews.title: Not Recommended until the below problems are resolved.
customer_reviews.text: 1. Screen display is not at all good. If you could look keenly, you could see the screen flickering all the time. Straining your eyes. (it came up with 48 Hz, updated to 60 Hz albeit the problem is there. 2. Contrast is not good. 3. Wifi keeps disconnnecting if you are using the battery. (Updated the drivers, changed the settings, still the problem is there). 4. I am using win 10 pro (came with the purchase), keeps restarting saying encountered a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Saran

customer_reviews.title: Seller is selling refurbished laptops
customer_reviews.text: 1. When recieved laptop it had other people pictures on it. 2. After 1 year of use the laptop charging port works only 80% of the time. 3. After 1 year of use the keyboard only works 80% of the time. Some buttons dont work sometimes. 4. I don't trust Amazon anymore. They are not doing a good job anymore sad before I was the first and most loyal customers now not sooo much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Workhorse Excellent Supplier
customer_reviews.text: These E580 laptops are nice and light weight office work horses. My staff can even run some 3D games on them if they feel the need. I have 7 of these on site and 16 more coming. OEM Genuine makes the purchase very nice since the systems are shipped fast, and come with a simple install. No garbage software except McAfee and that is a pretty easy removal. In all I am a very satisfied customer. If you are looking to buy we have these deployed for teachers and counselors in a High School and they not only hold up so far, but do the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Spetter

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: I've now had this laptop for under 11 months. The fingerprint id has quick working and now the speaker will not work. Beware
customer_reviews.author: PUGdaddy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing business machine.
customer_reviews.text: I was coming from a 10 yr old Thinkpad. It was an amazingly reliable machine. I dropped it out of my truck and it died. I searched for a new laptop and immediately went to a new Thinkpad. They are just the best value. It’s not the sexiest design but it is a workhorse with amazing reliability. Great value for $1,038 tax included. I’m a Thinkpad fan for life!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Poor Warranty Service
customer_reviews.text: Laptop quit working after mild use for less than a year. OEM Genuine supposedly offers warranty but after I sent the laptop to them they returned and said I need to work directly with Lenovo. This cost me several extra days of down time. I guess I expected a better product and service after paying $1000+ for this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Configured
customer_reviews.text: I lost my work machine and needed a fast machine quick...oemgenuine's config was exactly what I needed and they got it here fast.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly P. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is just what I wanted. Only dislike is the speaker quality. Sound is excellent when I bluetooth to my speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in 1 yr
customer_reviews.text: I have had at least 7 to 8 laptops till now and never had a laptop die in an year.My laptop stopped working.I would not recommend this laptop.Never expected it would have problems since it has good configuration.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: This machine is perfect. Exactly what I expected. Great value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Oren Hadar

customer_reviews.title: Charger makes noise
customer_reviews.text: The machine works well, however the charger makes a very Annoying noise. I even have unplug the cord sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: OP

product_meta.title: OEM Lenovo ThinkPad Edge E590 15.6" FHD Display 1920x1080, Intel Quad Core i7-8565U, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD NVMe, WiFi Intel 9260-AC, Fingerprint, W10P
product_meta.description:
Oemgenuine sells some computers with upgraded configurations. If the computer has modifications (listed above), then the manufacturer box is opened for installation and testing purposes. If no modifications are listed, the item is unopened and untested.

Operating System: Genuine Microsoft Windows 10 Professional 64

Processor: Intel Quad Core i7-8565U (1.8GHz - 4.6GHz, 8MB Cache)

RAM: 16GB DDR4-2400MHz

Display: 15.6" FHD (1920x1080)

Graphics: Intel UHD 620

Storage: 512GB Solid State Drive (PCIe-NVMe)

Optical Drive: None

Wireless: Intel Wireless-AC 9260, Wi-Fi 2x2 802.11ac + Bluetooth 5.0, M.2 card

Bluetooth: 5.0 wireless

Fingerprint Reader: Yes

Keyboard: 6-row, spill-resistant, multimedia Fn keys, numeric keypad

Mouse: TouchPad and TrackPoint

Webcam: 720p HD Webcam and Microphone

Ports: Two USB 3.1 Gen 1 (one Always On), one USB 3.1 Type-C Gen 2, one USB 2.0, HDMI 1.4b, Ethernet (RJ-45), headphone / microphone combo jack, microSD card reader, security keyhole

Audio: HD Audio, Conexant CX11880 codec / stereo speakers, 2W x 2, Dolby Advanced Audio / dual array microphone, headphone / microphone combo jack

Battery: Integrated Li-ion 45Wh

Power Supply: 65 Watt USB-C adapter

Weight: 4.68 LBS

Features: 16GB DDR4 2400MHz RAM, 512GB SSD NVMe, Fingerprint Reader
